irthomasthomas/llm-consortium

Orchestrates multiple language models for collaborative problem solving and consensus

View on index

Related repos

  • Multi-agent framework for building collaborative LLM applications
  • Programming language for collaborating with AI language models
  • Executes reasoning paths in parallel with language models
  • Code and tutorials for building large language models from scratch in PyTorch
  • tools for building and evaluating advanced LLM reasoning algorithms
  • unified language model for both understanding and generation tasks
  • Framework for language agents with cognitive architectures
  • Hierarchical LLM reasoning with thought templates
  • Curated resources and tools for building, fine-tuning, and deploying large language models
